text1:
David Grilli is a Web Developer from Ciudad Guayana, Venezuela; currently living in London, United Kingdom, Europe, Earth, Milky Way, Universe, Multiverse. He's passionate about technology, user experience and web development; and he's always motivated to learn and improve every day.


He studied Computer Engineering at UCAB and UCAB Guayana, and coursed the CCNA career certification at Cisco Networking Academy. He was also the manager of Guayana GDG, a community for people interested in Google's developer technology.


When in High School, he showed a notable interest in Basic Sciences; and discovered his passion for Programming during his first year at the University.


He enjoys hacking, watching movies, listening to rock & roll, running, swimming, throwing frisbee, playing videogames and hanging out with his family and friends.


He also enjoys playing guitar and the drums.


"I believe in technology bringing people together"
- David Grilli
text2:
You can contact David anytime to:

  • Say hi.
  • Talk about a job vacancy.
  • Ask him to join or mentor your startup.
  • Invite him to speak at your event or write for your publication.
  • Give him feedback about this website.

Contact info:

  • Email: website@djgrill.com
  • Skype: davidgrillidiaz
text3:

text4:
David has worked with the following technologies:

  • Ruby, Rails, Python, Django
  • HTML5, CSS3, Haml, Sass
  • JavaScript, CoffeeScript, jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap
  • Backbone.js, Underscore.js, Require.js, Node.js
  • AJAX, JSON, XML
  • MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Oracle, NoSQL
  • Git, GitHub
  • Heroku, Google App Engine
  • Mac OS, GNU/Linux, MS Windows
  • Apache HTTP, Solr

He also blogs at Ruby y Yo about Ruby and Rails (content in Spanish).
text5:
He's a very motivated developer; always open to learn more and help others.

If you want him to join your team, check the Contact section.
text6:
David has worked as:

  • Freelance Software Developer.
  • Freelance Professor of Programming, Calculus and Physics.
  • Web Developer at Bakedweb.
  • Software Developer at 4Geeks.
  • Web Developer at UCAB.
  • Web Developer at Fasha in Enschede, The Netherlands.
  • Web Developer at GirlsOnAMap in Cupertino, California.
  • Web Developer at Potato in London, UK.
text7: If you think David could be a good match for your team, check the Contact section.
